.. _`design_system_components_link`:

Link
====

.. figure:: images/component_link.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

A link component is used to navigate to a certain location in the application or trigger a certain event. It can be a text, an icon, an icon and its label text etc.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.navigation.Link.__module__`
